juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Orange sprayer bottle
*   Black and orange sprayer pump mechanism
*   Black sprayer trigger handle
*   Brass-colored sprayer nozzle tip
*   Label with text and orange icons on the sprayer bottle
*   Silver-colored, clip-point knife blade
*   Black, contoured knife handle
*   Silver-colored knife bolster
*   Silver-colored knife pommel
*   "BUCK USA" marking on the knife blade
